接口 mobios.dist.Metric
的使用

使用 Metric 的软件包
mobios.dist

mobios.dist 中 Metric 的使用
 

实现 Metric 的 mobios.dist 中的类
 class CountedMetric
          Wrapper around a base Metric that counts the invocations of getDistance(IndexObject,IndexObject).
 class ImageMetric
          Computes the distance between images.
 class LMetric
          This class computes the L family distance function on two vectors.
 class MSMetric
          MSDataMetric implements the Metric interface.
 class MSMSMetric
          MSMSMetric is an implementation of a fuzzy cosine distance metric for comparing tandem spectra signatures.
 class SequenceFragmentMetric
          Computes distance on two Fragments.
 class WHDGlobalFragmentMetric
          This class computes global alignment with weighted Hamming distance
 class WHDGlobalSequenceFragmentMetric
          Computes global alignment on Fragments with Weighted Hamming Distance
 

参数类型为 Metric 的 mobios.dist 中的构造方法
CountedMetric(Metric baseMetric)
          Creates a CountedMetric with a given base Metric, setting the internal counter to zero.
